clinical_history: Patient with unexplained weight loss and fatigue.
findings: Pulmonary embolism suspected; filling defect in segmental artery of diaphragmatic region.
Thoracic aortic aneurysm measuring 39 mm in diameter.
Collapse of diaphragmatic region lobe with volume loss.
Patchy ground-glass opacities noted in diaphragmatic region.
Small pneumothorax on the diaphragmatic region side.
recommendations: Consider CT or HRCT for detailed evaluation.
